approach_intro: Flexibility training isn't just about touching your toes. It's about understanding your body as an integrated system where science meets intuition, where breath unlocks what force cannot, and where emotional awareness transforms physical capability.
hormonal_health_text: Your flexibility isn't the same every day, and it shouldn't be. I teach you to work with your menstrual cycle, understanding how hormone fluctuations affect connective tissue, recovery capacity, and nervous system regulation. This is movement that truly moves WITH you.
qual_intro_1: I bring a unique intersection of evidence-based training, artistic expression, and holistic body wisdom to every class I teach.
qual_intro_2: My approach has been shaped by years of adaptive movement. Through yoga, dance, weightlifting, swimming, and triathlon training, combined with deep study of how bodies actually change and adapt, I've built training for bodies that live full lives.
qual_intro_3: I don't just teach stretches. I teach you to understand your body, trust its signals, and work with its natural rhythms to achieve sustainable, functional transformation.
